sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products: any[]; filteredProducts: any[]; properties: string[]; selectedProperties: string[] = []; manufacturers: string[]; selectedManufacturers: string[] = []; constructor() { this.products = productsData; this.filteredProducts = this.products; } filterProducts() { this.filteredProducts = this.products.filter(product => { let propertyFilter = true; let manufacturerFilter = false; // Check if product matches selected properties for (const property of Object.keys(this.selectedProperties)) { if (this.selectedProperties[property] && !product.properties.includes(property)) { propertyFilter = false; break; } } // Check if product matches selected manufacturers for (const manufacturer of Object.keys(this.selectedManufacturers)) { if (this.selectedManufacturers[manufacturer] && product.manufacturer === manufacturer) { manufacturerFilter = true; break; } } return propertyFilter && manufacturerFilter; }); }
{{ property }}
{{ manufacturer }}
